name: Fast Food aka oatmeal pancake delivery by a running raptor
description:
This 'quick' drawing shows Hypersensitivosaurus on his way to Cold Turkey's cave/ nest for an oatmeal pancake delivery. Your favorite velociraptor is running so fast that he has to secure his baseball cap with a string. 

FYI: Warm oatmeal pancakes taste better than lukewarm oatmeal pancakes and lukewarm oatmeal pancakes taste better than cold ones. 

The scene depicted, is closely related to a happening in my upcoming book titled "Hypersensitivosaurus and Cold Turkey" where the former visits the latter after an unfortunate incident.

Aside from writing this book, I am also illustrating it and I will be including process art and little anecdotes too. This particular drawing will be uniquely owned by you though.
